name: Fourth Wall (Reversed Game Studio)
description:
(THIS GAME IS OPEN-SOURCE https://github.com/Reversed-Game-Studios/FourthWall) 

In our first game, you go around breaking walls while dodging obstacles and jumping on platforms but on the fourth stage there is a bit of a twist.

Controls:

ESC - Pause

W, A, S, D - Move

Space - Jump

C - Crouch

Shift - Run
